teamMembers.personalBiography: üí°I found my calling in leveraging my technology expertise to develop and implement SAP business solutions, thus improving information flow, database administration, process management, and data processing.  üéØAs an accomplished SAP consultant with 10+ years of expertise in the installation of SUSE operating system SLES 11, 12, and SLES 15 SP02, SAP HANA Enterprise Edition 2.0 SPS05 Rev 50 for B1, SAP Business One version for SAP HANA 9.0, 9.3 and 10.0, SQL 2014 in a testing environment before deploying to production, I have a successful track record in managing SAP projects, stakeholder relationship management, providing technical user support, business systems analysis and business process improvement. Consequently, I have streamlined business operations in different industries, including Tumaini Self Service Limited, Tononoka Group of Companies, Spice World Limited, Goodlife Pharmacy T/A Mimosa Pharmacy, Mondelez Kenya, Healthy U Limited, Chandarana Food Plus Limited, and Carbacid Limited.
teamMembers.additionalInfo: ‚≠êBeing a strategic leader in the technology space, I embody a transformative management style that prioritizes effective performance, motivating IT teams to deliver business solutions as per client requests and providing technical user support to optimize the user experience. In the course of my career progression, I have developed technical skills, including RAID configuration, conducting SAP Business One Upgrade testing, preparing data extraction plans, providing post-go-live support, and project life cycle management. I take pride in inspiring mutual team collaboration to ensure the achievement of project objectives and standardizing service delivery through maintaining compliance with quality assurance standards.
